name: Hockey Hysteria
description:
Play as one of the top 25 national teams in this physics-based hockey game!

Hockey Hysteria is a fast-paced, physics-based hockey game that lets you play as one of 25 top-ranked national teams in the sport. Challenge your friends on a shared screen (or challenge the CPU) to an intense battle of first to five goals, or try your luck in the single player World Cup mode.

The following nations are included:
Austria (AUT), Belarus (BLR), Canada (CAN), Czech Republic (CZE), Denmark (DEN), Team Europe (EUR), Finland (FIN), France (FRA), Great Britain (GBR), Germany (GER), Hungary (HUN), Italy (ITA), Japan (JAP), Kazakhstan (KAZ), South Korea (KOR), Latvia (LAT), Norway (NOR), Poland (POL), Russia (RUS), Slovenia (SLO), Switzerland (SUI), Slovakia (SVK), Sweden (SWE), Ukraine (UKR), United States of America (USA).
